name: Wild West Ghost Town Survival!!!!
description:
Made for Week 90 of the Weekly Game Jam

Theme: Radioactivity

Music by 21stFret

Coding by fragmenta (me)

Note: Best played in fullscreen

Note 2: There is no way to control the volume in-game, so you need to use your native volume controls

In a distant world, video games have taken over society through radiowaves (with help from aliens, of course). You, being the extremely boring person you are, weren't affected. The aliens saw this and offered you a deal: if you could beat one of their games, they would release the human race. That game was...

WILD

WEST

GHOST

TOWN 

SURVIVAL

I kinda leaned on Twine as a crutch, again. The code was a bit messy, so if any bugs occur, please tell me. I'm planning on adding to this game when I can, so your feedback means everything to me.
